There's a Marks and Spencer and another grocery store (plus several other shops - including one that sells Paddington Bear items) at the station, so you can get items to eat in your room if you'd rather not deal with any of the many nearby restaurants. They really are very nice folks - incredibly warm and friendly, and the staff make the hotel what it is.
